_warning: ⚠️  DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE MANUALLY! Use /admin/add-judge interface instead. Manual edits may be overwritten and can break the system. All judge additions should go through the admin panel for proper validation and backup.

currentChiefJustice.name: Justice D.Y. Chandrachud
careerHighlights: Chief Justice of Allahabad High Court (2013-2016)
currentChiefJustice.biography: Justice D.Y. Chandrachud, born on November 11, 1959, is the 50th Chief Justice of India. He is the son of former Chief Justice Y.V. Chandrachud. Known for his progressive judgments on privacy, LGBTQ+ rights, and constitutional law. He has been instrumental in digitization of the Indian judiciary and has authored several landmark judgments including the right to privacy judgment.
notableJudgments: Right to Privacy - K.S. Puttaswamy vs Union of India
Justice K.S. Puttaswamy (Retd.) vs Union of India

currentJudges.name: Justice Surya Kant
education: Bachelor's degree in Law (1984) from Maharishi Dayanand University, Rohtak
careerHighlights: Started practicing at District Court, Hisar (1984)
Practiced in Punjab and Haryana High Court (1985)
Judge, Punjab and Haryana High Court (2004)
Chief Justice, Himachal Pradesh High Court (2018)
currentJudges.biography: Justice Surya Kant was born on February 10, 1962, at Hisar (Haryana) in a middle-class family. He specialized in Constitutional, Service and Civil matters. Represented universities, boards, corporations, banks and also the High Court itself. He was elevated as a Judge of the Supreme Court of India on May 24, 2019.

currentJudges.name: Justice B.R. Gavai
education: LL.B. from Government Law College, Mumbai
currentJudges.biography: Justice B.R. Gavai was born on September 29, 1962. He started his legal career in 1987 and practiced mainly in constitutional, service, and commercial matters. He served as Advocate General of Maharashtra before being elevated to the Bombay High Court and then to the Supreme Court.

currentJudges.name: Justice Vikram Nath
careerHighlights: Started practice in Allahabad High Court (1987)
currentJudges.biography: Justice Vikram Nath was born on September 24, 1962. He has extensive experience in constitutional and civil matters. He served as Chief Justice of Gujarat High Court before his elevation to the Supreme Court of India.

formerChiefJustices.name: Justice N.V. Ramana
formerChiefJustices.biography: Justice N.V. Ramana served as the 48th Chief Justice of India. He was known for his emphasis on judicial independence and access to justice. During his tenure, he focused on reducing pendency of cases and improving the justice delivery system.

formerChiefJustices.name: Justice S.A. Bobde
formerChiefJustices.biography: Justice S.A. Bobde served as the 47th Chief Justice of India. He was part of the Ayodhya verdict and emphasized the use of technology in the judiciary. He advocated for alternative dispute resolution mechanisms.

formerJudges.name: Justice R.F. Nariman
formerJudges.position: Former Judge, Supreme Court of India
formerJudges.biography: Justice R.F. Nariman was known for his expertise in constitutional law and commercial arbitration. He authored several landmark judgments and was instrumental in strengthening arbitration laws in India.

formerJudges.name: Justice U.U. Lalit
formerJudges.position: Former Judge, Supreme Court of India
formerJudges.biography: Justice U.U. Lalit had a distinguished career as a senior advocate before his elevation to the Supreme Court. He was known for his expertise in criminal law and constitutional matters.
